name: ROCK PAPER SCISSORS SIMULATOR
description:
ROCK PAPER SCISSORS SIMULATOR

 

English

Here is my game, which adds a new perspective to the rock paper scissors game and is made in about 3 hours. have fun.

 

NUMBER KEYS

- All numbers have a function (some numbers can direct you to my favorite music or my social media accounts.)

-2: restart

-3: spawn from corners

-4: spawn in random place

-5: constantly spawn in random places

-Esc: close the game

 

*********************************************

 

Turkce

Tas kagıt makas oyununa yeni bir bakis acisi katan ve yaklasik 3 saatte yapilan oyunum karsinizda. iyi eglenceler.

 

SAYI TUSLARI

-Tum sayilar bir fonksiyona sahip  (bazi numaralar sizi  sevdigim muziklere veya sosyal medya hesaplarima yonlendirebilir.)

-2: bastan basla

-3: koselerde olustur

-4: rastgele bolgelerde olustur

-5: surekli rastgele bolgelerde olustur

-Esc: oyunu kapat
